description: A kidnapping gang and slave trading group based in Sabaody Archipelago, led by Peterman. They specialize in capturing people, particularly valuable targets like merfolk, to supply the Human Auctioning House.

affiliations.description: The Hound Pets supply captives to the Human Auctioning House for the slave trade

keyMoments.title: Hound Pets' First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The Hound Pets, led by Peterman, debut while tracking the Straw Hats through Sabaody Park after learning they have a mermaid.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the criminal organization responsible for Camie's kidnapping.

keyMoments.title: Hound Pets Kidnap Camie
keyMoments.description: The Hound Pets successfully kidnap Camie while the Straw Hats are distracted, planning to sell her at the Human Auctioning House.
keyMoments.significance: Sets in motion the rescue mission and the arc's climactic events at the auction house.

goal: Kidnap valuable targets to supply the slave trade and profit from the Human Auctioning House
